attributes.action: Make wearing a face covering in indoor shops mandatory
attributes.additional_details: Strong leadership on this will normalise mask wearing which should help control the virus, create confidence in a return to the High St and protect staff.
attributes.background: I would like the government to make the wearing of a face covering or mask mandatory when inside all shops during the Covid 19 crisis.
